synopsis.text: Rescued from the brink of drowning, a young ninja girl named Chidori finds her purpose in serving her savior, the ambitious warlord Oda Nobunaga. Despite her adorable and innocent facade, Chidori is a highly skilled ninja, ready to embark on critical missions to ensure Nobunaga's victory in the Warring States period of Japan. Joined by her friend Sukezou, they venture to serve under Nobunaga, who dreams of unifying Japan through military might. As they navigate the colorful and eccentric cast of Nobunaga's family and servants, Chidori's unwavering determination to help her master achieve his goals sets the stage for a thrilling and comedic wartime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
